Text: My lord, over here. Look at all the fish!

Wow, you're right. You found a great fishing spot in
just one day.

Heheh. Yeah. I found it last night. I also made some
fishing rods, so how about a little competition to
see who can catch the most fish?

Sounds fun, but what about Alpha? She's building the
house all by herself...

Lady Alpha will be fine. It's more efficient if we
split the tasks.

We're on an important mission to procure food.
We need to do our best to catch some tasty fish.

...You really know how to talk me into it,
don't you?

You're overthinking it. Anyway, if we don't start
soon, the fish will get away.
Hmm... Alright, let's do it.

From here, that red fish looks like a good target.
It's flavor is light and delicious.
Oh, I see. What about that big one over there?

You've got a good eye, my lord. That one's tough to
catch, but it's really tasty.

It looks black on the outside, but when you cut it
open, it's nice and white on the inside. The skin is
delicious, and when it's fresh, it smells great.
Personally, I love it grilled with salt.

You sure know a lot about fish, Zeta. You're like a
fish expert.

Heheh. Flattery won't get you anywhere. That's all
just common knowledge.

(She's wagging her tail... She must've liked being
called a fish expert.)
...Alright, that makes my tenth catch.
Wow, you're good. I can't let you outdo me.
You're also doing pretty well, my lord. We're tied.

Oh, come on. You chose the fishing spot and prepared
the rods. I feel like I'm just catching fish because
of your setup.

Don't think that way, my lord. As long as you're
having fun, that's what matters.

Well, maybe we should wrap it up for now. If we
catch too many, there won't be anyone to eat them
all.

After all, since there are only three of us on this
island, we won't even have anyone to share our food
with.

Really? I think we could use more, and if we have
extra, we can always dry them out to preserve them.

Alright, I'll leave that to you, Zeta. I'll go help
Alpha withâ€”

Wait! ...How about we go to another spot where we
can catch different fish?

Eating the same kind of fish all the time gets
boring, right? I found another spot with some rare
fish... What do you think?

Hmm, you have a point... Although it does feel a bit
extravagant for deserted island life.

But you get my point, right? It would be a problem
if I got bored and stopped eating.
Are you saying you might actually do that?
I know myself best. So, will you come with me?

(Well, even if I go to Alpha, she might not let me
help anyway...)

(She'll probably say something like, "I'll handle
this. You take a break." In that case, fishing might
be more productive.)
Alright, I'll go with you.

I knew you would say that, Shadow. It's a bit far
from the base, so I'll guide you there.
...We're not catching anything.
Yeah, nothing.

Not only are we not catching anything, but they're
not even biting...

That's strange. Maybe the fish here are more
cautious.
...Do you really think that's the issue?

Of course. We still have time, so let's wait
patiently. It wouldn't be much fun if the rare fish
were too easy to catch, would it?

Judging by the tide, they should start biting around
sunset. Trust the fish expert, it'll be fine.
Really? Alright, I'll trust you.

I am a bit worried about Alpha, but...well, I guess
this is part of the job.

(Actually...this spot doesn't have many fish. But
since I let Shadow catch a lot earlier, he trusts me
now...)

(I feel bad for tricking him, but it's true that the
fish will start biting at sunset, so I hope he'll
forgive me.)

(Anyway, we've caught enough to avoid getting
scolded by Lady Alpha. I'll just keep Shadow to
myself a little longer.)
...Heheh. Things are about to get fun, my lord.
